description: A mixed use scheme comprising 354 sq.m of commercial/employment space and 146 residential flats in two wings around a courtyard and private shared gardens.  Heights range from 4-7 storeys (plus galleries) including a lower ground/basement level 38 car park spaces (amended to include additional information on viability).
decision_conditions:
The development shall be constructed to achieve EcoHomes/BREEAM 'very good' and shall be maintained permanently in that form to the satisfaction of the Local  Planning Authority.

REASON: In the interest of sustainable development
